snippet: An app called Upwardly Mobile offers customized comparisons on places to live.
abstract: App City column on Upwardly Mobile, Web service that compares the economic opportunities in different cities based on a user's occupation and other priorities; service has been developed by the Sunlight Foundation, which focuses on government transparency, to show what developers can do when the government makes data available in usable formats.
lead_paragraph: An app called Upwardly Mobile offers customized comparisons on places to live.

headline.print_headline: Where Would You Live If Life Were an App?
headline.seo: Upwardly Mobile App Offers Custom Comparisons on Places to Live
headline.main: Where Would You Live if Life Were an App?
